languages.text: "Ваша Светлость". {n}Клеменциа учтиво склоняет голову. Для канцлера Вольного Торговца женщина одета весьма скромно — парадный камзол, начищенные сапоги да удобный плащ. В позолоченных ножнах красуется сабля — сложно сказать, для защиты или красоты. Лишь кольцо с гербом рода Версериан выдает в ней принадлежность к высшей страте.{/n} "Губернатор ожидает на внешней периферии дворца. Дайте знать, когда захотите принять его".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость". {n}Клеменциа учтиво склоняет голову. Для канцлера Вольного Торговца женщина одета весьма скромно — парадный камзол, начищенные сапоги да удобный плащ. В позолоченных ножнах красуется сабля — сложно сказать, для защиты или красоты. Лишь кольцо с гербом рода Версериан выдает в ней принадлежность к высшей страте.{/n} "Губернатор ожидает на внешней периферии дворца. Дайте знать, когда захотите принять его".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

languages.text: “大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅礼貌地低下了头。尽管身为行商浪人的宰相，她的穿着却相当简单。她穿着阅兵式的连衣裙、锃亮的靴子，以及舒适的斗篷，挂在身上的镀金刀鞘中插着一把军刀，至于是为了炫耀，还是为了作为防身武器使用，就没人知道了。只有手上韦尔森家族的戒指才能表明，她隶属于地位最高的社会阶层。{/n}“总督正在宫殿外围等待。您什么时候想见他一面，请告诉我就好。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: “大人。”{n}克莱门缇雅礼貌地低下了头。尽管身为行商浪人的宰相，她的穿着却相当简单。她穿着阅兵式的连衣裙、锃亮的靴子，以及舒适的斗篷，挂在身上的镀金刀鞘中插着一把军刀，至于是为了炫耀，还是为了作为防身武器使用，就没人知道了。只有手上韦尔森家族的戒指才能表明，她隶属于地位最高的社会阶层。{/n}“总督正在宫殿外围等待。您什么时候想见他一面，请告诉我就好。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia inclina la cabeza educadamente. Para ser canciller de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, su ropa es sencilla. Una camisola de desfile, botas bien limpias y una capa cómoda. Lleva un sable con vaina dorada, aunque no sabrías si es decorativo o para defensa personal. La única prueba de su pertenencia al estamento superior es el anillo con el emblema de los Werserian.{/n} «El gobernador espera en las afueras del palacio. Avíseme cuando quiera verle».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Clementia inclina la cabeza educadamente. Para ser canciller de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, su ropa es sencilla. Una camisola de desfile, botas bien limpias y una capa cómoda. Lleva un sable con vaina dorada, aunque no sabrías si es decorativo o para defensa personal. La única prueba de su pertenencia al estamento superior es el anillo con el emblema de los Werserian.{/n} «El gobernador espera en las afueras del palacio. Avíseme cuando quiera verle».

languages.text: 「陛下」{n}クレメンティアが丁寧に頭を上げる。パレード用のダブレット、洗練されたブーツ、着心地のよさそうなクローク。彼女は自由開拓者の議長にしてはずいぶんシンプルな服装をしている。金装飾の鞘にはサーベルが納刀されている。単なる飾りなのか、身を守るのに使うのかは誰にもわからない。ウェルザリアン家の紋章が刻まれた指輪だけが、彼女が社会層の最高位にいることを示している。{/n}「総督が宮殿の周辺に待機しています。話す準備ができましたらお知らせください」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下」{n}クレメンティアが丁寧に頭を上げる。パレード用のダブレット、洗練されたブーツ、着心地のよさそうなクローク。彼女は自由開拓者の議長にしてはずいぶんシンプルな服装をしている。金装飾の鞘にはサーベルが納刀されている。単なる飾りなのか、身を守るのに使うのかは誰にもわからない。ウェルザリアン家の紋章が刻まれた指輪だけが、彼女が社会層の最高位にいることを示している。{/n}「総督が宮殿の周辺に待機しています。話す準備ができましたらお知らせください」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia senkt höflich ihren Kopf. Für die Kanzlerin {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist sie recht einfach gekleidet – Paradewams, polierte Stiefel und ein bequemer Umhang. Sie trägt einen Säbel in einer goldenen Scheide – ob als Show oder zum Schutz, lässt sich nicht sagen. Nur ihr Ring mit dem Wappen der Werserians deutet darauf hin, dass sie aus höchsten sozialen Kreisen stammt.{/n} "Der Gouverneur wartet im Außenbereich des Palastes. Lasst es mich bitte wissen, wenn Ihr ihn sehen möchtet."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}." {n}Clementia senkt höflich ihren Kopf. Für die Kanzlerin {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} ist sie recht einfach gekleidet – Paradewams, polierte Stiefel und ein bequemer Umhang. Sie trägt einen Säbel in einer goldenen Scheide – ob als Show oder zum Schutz, lässt sich nicht sagen. Nur ihr Ring mit dem Wappen der Werserians deutet darauf hin, dass sie aus höchsten sozialen reisen stammt.{/n} "Der Gouverneur wartet im Außenbereich des Palastes. Lasst es mich bitte wissen, wenn Ihr ihn sehen möchtet."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, »{n}vous salue Clémentia en inclinant la tête. Pour la chancelière d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, sa tenue est des plus simples : un modeste pourpoint d'apparat accompagné de bottes lustrées et d'une cape confortable. Elle porte à son côté un sabre protégé par un fourreau en or, mais vous ne sauriez dire s'il est là pour l'apparence ou si elle sait véritablement s'en servir. Seul l'anneau marqué des armoiries des Werserian atteste de son appartenance à la haute société.{/n} « Le gouverneur patiente aux abords du palais. Faites-moi signe quand vous voudrez le rencontrer. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, »{n}vous salue Clémentia en inclinant la tête. Pour la chancelière d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, sa tenue est des plus simples : un modeste pourpoint d'apparat accompagné de bottes lustrées et d'une cape confortable. Elle porte à son côté un sabre protégé par un fourreau en or, mais vous ne sauriez dire s'il est là pour l'apparence ou si elle sait véritablement s'en servir. Seul l'anneau marqué des armoiries des Werserian atteste de son appartenance à la haute société.{/n} « Le gouverneur patiente aux abords du palais. Faites-moi signe quand vous voudrez le rencontrer. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, başıyla kibarca selam veriyor. Bir Hür Tacir şansölyesi olmasına rağmen epey sadelikle bir tören yeleği, cilalı bir çift çizme ve rahat bir pelerin giymiş. Yaldızlı kınında bir kılıç taşıyor ancak o kılıç göstermelik mi yoksa kendini korumak için mi, orası belli değil. En üst seviye sosyal tabakadan olduğunu yalnızca üzerinde Werserian arması olan yüzüğü belli ediyor.{/n} "Vali, saraya kabul edilmeye hazır bekliyor. Lütfen onu görmek istediğinizde bana haber verin."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}." {n}Clementia bows her head politely. For a chancellor to a Rogue Trader, she is dressed rather simply — a parade doublet, polished boots, and a comfortable cloak. She bears a sabre in a gilded scabbard — whether for show or protection, one could not say. Only her ring with the Werserian coat of arms indicates that she is of the highest social stratum.{/n} "The governor is waiting on the periphery of the palace. Please let me know when you would like to see him."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri." {n}Clementia, başıyla kibarca selam veriyor. Bir Hür Tacir şansölyesi olmasına rağmen oldukça sade bir şekilde bir tören yeleği, cilalı bir çift çizme ve rahat bir pelerin giymiş. Yaldızlı bir kında bir kılıç taşıyor ancak o kılıç göstermelik mi yoksa kendini korumak için mi, orası belli değil. En üst seviye sosyal tabakadan olduğu, sadece üzerinde Werserian arması olan yüzüğünden belli oluyor.{/n} "Vali, sarayın yakınlarında sizi bekliyor. Lütfen onu görmek istediğinizde bana haber verin."
